description: Zeigt Infos über einen Befehl oder eine Liste aller Befehle.

arg_types.list [<option>, all]: List info about a specific option, or list all manageable options.
arg_types.set <option> <value>: Set an option to the given value.

arg_types.start: Begins a game in the current channel.
arg_types.stop: Stops the game in the current channel.
arg_types.addchannel: Admin only. Add this channel to the list of wordgame channels.
arg_types.removechannel: Admin only. Remove this channel from the list of wordgame channels.
arg_types.info: Show important info about the game.
arg_types.points: Show the leaderboard of points in this server.
